111.content: as you wake up you notice all thre girls staring at you with sakura. "he cant be that bad." sakura tells to the angels. as the angels turn thinking quickly you dive behind the couch."where did he go?" the blond one ass as you try and poses sakura to at least get some names. when you finaly get a opaning and poses him the agels have given up hope of finding you."hopefuly we will find him later." says the angel with the spiked bat. you assume that you can just make sakura trip and pretend to have amnesia. the only way to do this you think is to trip on that skateboard over in the hallway. "where are you going sakura-chan?" says the spiked bat one. however just as you here that you put your foot on the skateboard and trip you get a upskirt shot on the one with the bat."sakura-chan!!" she yells at you. as you try to back up she hits you with her spiked bat and that kills him and sends you flying againsts a wall denting it."so thats..." is all you can make out as you suddenly hear a voice as you also see sakura get revived. "what are you doing kill him!!!!!!!" says the mysterois voice as you feel all self control disapering. "yes master." you here yourself say as you some how grab sakura and run to a abandon buildin to build traps so you can take out the angels two.5 HOURS LATER. you hear your self laugh as you see sakura in a tresure chest like container. hearing your self laugh more and turn around you see a bg computer screen that shows all three angels navigating through a maze like hologram *sonic adventure 2 eggman theme plays*"give up! you cant fin me or him, I wont totaly destroy you. unbenounced to you the thre angels have found your fake wall exit to the hologram."hahahahaomhhhhhhhh!" you say as you get hit with a spiked bat wraped in a towel."i knew it!" the blond one said but as they noked you to the ground you felt yourself reaching into your pokect for the in case of angels switch they pin you to the grounnd and take your hand out of your poket."why is his eyes completely white?" the one with the bat asks." i dont care!!!!" she yells as she hits you with the electric rod and get fryed "ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! you yell as you feel like you just went into a tub full of electricity. " as you feel your control returning you try to raise your hand to stop another of the blond angels attacks however as she trys to use it again the one in a military uniform stops her. "ive hered of this, probubly sombody took control of him by using a shrine. "who would do that" evreybody asks as you cough up some blood and try to say that you where sorry but all that came out was gurgles." i think we need to bring him back to the house again and ask him what happend." as they grab you and sakur out of the box you feel that you just have gotten more power. when the five of you reter you try to raise your hand to oppen the door but
